attributes.action: St Olave's should not evict Orpington Scout Group
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.newsshopper.co.uk/news/9985331.Orpington_scout_group_told_by_St_Olave_s_School_to_leave/?ref=mr

St Olave's School has informed the 3rd Orpington Scout Group that it must leave its shared Goddington Lane premises by July 2013 (which it has occupied for 46 years). The land occupied is extremely small, distant from the main school site and would be of no advantage to a school with already copious amounts of land. This move should be blocked with immediate effect, or an explanation given otherwise as to why the land is required.
